author: anmenaga
body:
[These instructions for Kali Linux](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/docs/installation/linux.md#kali) specify to deploy

http://security.debian.org/debian-security/pool/updates/main/o/openssl/libssl1.0.0_1.0.1t-1+deb8u6_amd64.deb

which does Not exist.

Using a similar "libssl1.0.0_1.0.1t-1+deb8u7_amd64.deb" from that location terminates PS with Segmentation fault:
![kalisegfault](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11860095/32677700-4766cbae-c614-11e7-8b3d-7a21d80f08b1.png)

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @sdcampbell Could you please address the Issue and update docs?
